verses.text: A Song of degrees of David. Behold, how good and how pleasant it isfor brethren to dwell together in unity!
It islike the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, evenAaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garment;
As the dew of Hermon, and as the dewthat descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, evenlife for ever.
